EntityWithIdDto.description: DTO for entities with an id, name, slug, and optional image_background and language.

TagReadDto.description: DTO for Tag entity, with language field.

EntityUpdateDto.description: DTO for updating and creating entities with common fields - some optional.

EntityReadDto.description: General DTO for reading entities with common fields.

ReviewReadDto.description: DTO for reading reviews with simplified fields.

Pick_EntityReadDto.Exclude_keyofEntityRe.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

Omit_EntityReadDto.image_background_.description: Construct a type with the properties of T except for those in type K.

PlatformReadDto.description: DTO for ParentPlatform entity, without image_background.

GameUpdateDto.description:
DTO for updating and creating Game entities.
'name' and 'slug' are required, all other fields are optional.

get.description: Get all users (admin only) with optional pagination.

200.description: An object containing the authentication token.

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token.

200.description: A list of games in the user's wishlist.

get.description:
Get all games in a user's wishlist.
Requires the user's ID to be provided in the path.

200.description: The result of the add operation.

post.description:
Add a game to a user's wishlist.
Requires the user's ID and the game ID to be provided in the path.

200.description: The result of the remove operation.

delete.description:
Remove a game from a user's wishlist.
Requires the user's ID and the game ID to be provided in the path.

post.description:

Requires the user's ID and the game ID to be provided in the path.

200.description: The result of the remove operation.

delete.description:
Remove a game from a user's library.
Requires the user's ID and the game ID to be provided in the path.
